Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by Manchester in 1968...
Injured on 4/26/1975 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1977, off Nick Saez (SHP)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/8/1978, off Gene Thor (CBC)...
Signed as a free agent by Wisconsin on 2/3/1983 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/12/1985 to a 2-year deal worth $1,200,000 per year...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Second Base in 1985...
